Hero.subtitle_1: Specializing in High-Throughput Systems and Scalable Architecture.
Hero.subtitle_2: Transforming high-fidelity visual logic into scalable system architecture.

LiveActivity.title: Live Activity
LiveActivity.subtitle: Real-time synchronized data from system repositories.

heatmap.title: Contribution Heatmap
heatmap.description: This heatmap visualizes the frequency and intensity of system updates over the last 365 days. Every cell represents a production-ready iteration.

lpk-management-system.title: LPK Management System
lpk-management-system.problem: Vocational training centers (LPK) in Indonesia traditionally face fragmentation in student data, payroll, and government reporting compliance. Manual processes lead to high error rates and delayed certification.
lpk-management-system.system: A distributed system architecture designed for multi-tenant LPK management. Features an event-driven payroll engine, atomic student data tracking (from enrollment to placement), and an automated reporting layer that interfaces with regulatory formats.
lpk-management-system.solution: Reduced administrative overhead by 65%. Centralized repository for 2,000+ students. Zero-error payroll computation for staff and instructors. 100% compliance with digital certification standards.

analytics-dashboard.title: Real-time Analytics Dashboard
analytics-dashboard.problem: High-frequency GitHub events are difficult to visualize in a way that provides actionable engineering insights. Standard dashboards focus on activity quantity rather than quality and consistency.
analytics-dashboard.system: A high-throughput ingestion pipeline using Go to process GitHub webhooks. Data is aggregated and cached using Redis, then streamed to a React frontend using server-sent events. Custom SVG charts provide non-standard visualizations of work intensity.
analytics-dashboard.solution: Real-time observability of developer velocity. 99.9% accurate coding-hour estimations based on inter-commit temporal analysis. Instant feedback loop for system-wide engineering performance.

crm-system.title: Enterprise CRM Architecture
crm-system.problem: Traditional CRM systems often struggle with high-volume lead ingestion and complex multi-tenant partitioning, leading to latency in sales pipelines.
crm-system.system: Scale-oriented CRM system with automated lead scoring, multi-tenant database partitioning, and real-time activity tracking using Prisma and tRPC.
crm-system.solution: Optimized lead conversion rates by 40% and removed architectural bottlenecks for 10k+ daily concurrent users.

cloud-orchestrator.title: Cloud Orchestrator
cloud-orchestrator.problem: Managing distributed microservices across multiple environments without centralized observability leads to frequent downtime and slow incident response.
cloud-orchestrator.system: System-level tool for managing distributed microservices. Focuses on observability, container orchestration, and self-healing mechanisms via gRPC.
cloud-orchestrator.solution: 99.99% system availability and 80% faster deployment cycles for cross-regional infrastructure.

fallback.system: Details on the decomposition of this system will be available shortly.

Analytics.title: System Analytics
Analytics.subtitle: Quantifying logic, intensity, and technical patterns over time. Because if it's not measurable, it's not observable.

Projects.title: Case Studies
Projects.subtitle: System-driven decomposition of real-world problems. No prototypes—only production-grade assets and architectural depth.

About.title: Engineering Philosophy
About.quote: "Logic is the foundation, but systems are the execution. A great engineer builds both."

mindset.title: The System-Oriented Mindset
mindset.desc1: Based in Yogyakarta, I am a **System Builder** and Architect at the crossroads of precise visual logic and scalable engineering.
mindset.desc2: I am not just a Problem Solver, I am a **Builder**. I don't just fix code, I create systems from scratch—engineering the bridge between business vision and technical reality.

values.title: Core Operating Values
values.subtitle: The principles that govern every line of code I push.

system_first.title: System First
system_first.desc: I don't just write code; I design systems. Every component must justify its existence in the broader architecture.

decomposition.title: Decomposition
decomposition.desc: Breaking complex problems into atomic, manageable services is the core of sustainable engineering.

measurability.title: Measurability
measurability.desc: If a solution is not measurable, its success is purely subjective. I rely on data to drive architectural decisions.

Try.title: System Trial
Try.subtitle: Don't take my word for it. Initiate a trial connection to see the architecture in motion. All environments are sandboxed.

security_note.title: Security Note
security_note.desc: Persistent access requires an authorized PEM key. Contact for administrative credentials if deep structural auditing is required.

terminal.pii_warning: This environment contains sensitive PII data. Direct trial is disabled for public users. Request a personalized walkthrough.
